sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - வெல், இடும்புசெய், பெலன் தா, ஒன்றுசெய்
to behave proudly, to act stormily or boisterously or arrogantly
a) (Qal) to act insolently, to storm against, to beset, to importune
b) (Hiphil) to disturb, to alarm, to awe, to confuse, to make bold or proud
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to urge severely, that is, (figuratively) importune, embolden, capture, act insolently: - overcome, behave self proudly, make sure, strengthen.
Cognate: H4062, H7292, H7293, H7294, H7295, H7296
